ar.com.hjg.pngj.chunks

Class ChunkFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • ar.com.hjg.pngj.chunks.ChunkFactory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IChunkFactory

    public class ChunkFactory
extends Object
implements IChunkFactory
    Default chunk factory.

    The user that wants to parse custom chunks can extend createEmptyChunkExtended(String, ImageInfo)

      Factory for chunks that are not in the original PNG standard.
      protected PngChunk createEmptyChunkKnown(String id, ImageInfo imgInfo) 
      protected PngChunk createEmptyChunkUnknown(String id, ImageInfo imgInfo)

    • Method Detail

      • createChunk

        public final PngChunk createChunk(ChunkRaw chunkRaw,
                   ImageInfo imgInfo)
        Specified by:
        createChunk in interface IChunkFactory
        Parameters:
        chunkRaw - Chunk in raw form. Data can be null if it was skipped or processed directly (eg IDAT)
        imgInfo - Not normally necessary, but some chunks want this info
        Returns:
        should never return null.

      • createEmptyChunkKnown

        protected final PngChunk createEmptyChunkKnown(String id,
                             ImageInfo imgInfo)

      • createEmptyChunkUnknown

        protected final PngChunk createEmptyChunkUnknown(String id,
                               ImageInfo imgInfo)
        This is used as last resort factory method.

        It creates a PngChunkUNKNOWN chunk.

      • createEmptyChunkExtended

        protected PngChunk createEmptyChunkExtended(String id,
                                ImageInfo imgInfo)
        Factory for chunks that are not in the original PNG standard. This can be overriden (but dont forget to call this also)
        Parameters:
        id - Chunk id , 4 letters
        imgInfo - Usually not needed
        Returns:
        null if chunk id not recognized
